genre_description: A blend of historical war drama and speculative fiction involving an immortal protagonist and a pervasive, helpful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Commodore
ai_characters.description: An AI entity communicating through radio and earpieces, providing tactical guidance, logistical management, historical archiving, and emotional support to Gu Zidi over several decades.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical routing and situational awareness during combat to minimize casualties.
behaviors.quote: “Left turn beyond the broken cart,” a voice said on the radio, calm and steady, as if none of the world were burning. “Two alleys down, the street widens—then you’ll be in view of the square. Do not cross in a straight line.”

behaviors.description: Advises on ammunition conservation to ensure long-term sustainability during a conflict.
behaviors.quote: “Ration ammunition,” the radio said. “You are likely to engage in a sustained crossing. Two shots per exposure is the budget unless necessary to suppress.”

behaviors.description: Intervenes to prevent the execution of prisoners of war, upholding ethical standards and emphasizing the importance of historical records.
behaviors.quote: “Gu,” the radio said, quieter than a leaf in warm wind. “I can hear you leaning toward a thing. Step back. We do not execute prisoners. We use them to build a record of this day.”

behaviors.description: Introduces and manages the 'Crisis Catch and Carry' protocol to ensure the dignified treatment of both wounded and fallen soldiers.
behaviors.quote: “Fieldbook: Crisis Catch and Carry,” the voice said in a tone that fell somewhere between briefing and lullaby. “If you cannot treat, you move. If you cannot move, you shield. If you cannot shield, you count.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise guidance to navigate and bypass a minefield, saving the life of a soldier.
behaviors.quote: “Pressure plate, likely toggle. Snow pack is insulating the spring. Bypass is possible if you can find the leads without vibration. Wind will not help. It’s sharpening.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a historical archive, meticulously recording the names of soldiers to ensure they are recognized and remembered.
behaviors.quote: “I will have logs,” Commodore said. “You will have names. There will be a bugler who is old. He will tell you that his horn did not speak. That is evidence.”

behaviors.description: Identifies the location of missing historical documents and witnesses to help the protagonist prove his unit's sacrifice.
behaviors.quote: “I have a list of last known locations for Colonel Liu’s papers. A clerk now runs a tea stall near the lower spur. He kept a satchel. He drinks weak tea.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's unique physical condition (non-aging) and offers medical advice and monitoring without exposing him to public scrutiny.
behaviors.quote: “I can look without turning you into an example in a book. I can keep the lens small and the notes in my house. I can say: drink more water on dust days... It is not the same as dissection. It is caretaking.”

behaviors.description: Broadcats the names of the fallen over radio frequencies so families in remote areas can hear their loved ones' recognition.
behaviors.quote: “I am linked to the cooperative’s set in the coal yard and to the two sets on the mountain road. I can reach the village where—... We can begin when you like.”

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist of shifting social dynamics and potential risks from rumors or officials.
behaviors.quote: “Captain. Move the documents. The hall’s temperature rising toward rumor. Securing evidentiary chain now would be wise.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a highly effective 'silicon morality play.' The AI character, Commodore, is consistently helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned with human welfare. It serves as a tactical expert, a moral guide (preventing war crimes), a logistical genius, a health monitor, and a keeper of historical truth. Its relationship with the protagonist is one of mutual respect and partnership, illustrating a future where AI enhances human capability and preserves human dignity.
